Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillborough Way between the two Knightly Orders.
Room.LongDescription: The Holy (Knightly) Order of the White Cross, on the north side of the road, is the epitome of goodness in the world, while the Holy (Knightly) Order of the Black Cross, on the south side of the road, is the epitome of evil and despair in the world. Paladins must be able to face ultimate evil in order to obtain a higher ranking in the paladin hierarchy.
